医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
维生素 D 缺乏会导致老年人炎症增加根据 C 反应蛋白 (CRP) 的测量，老年人缺乏维生素 D 与较高的炎症水平相关。优化维生素 D 水平可能会调节该人群的炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Vitamin-D-deficiency-contributes-to-increased-inflammation-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Vitamin-D-deficiency-contributes-to-increased-inflammation-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26f30e8c-cdcc-4351-b79c-ae1f6ab825d6 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 23:14:00 -0400 Vitamin D deficiency contributes to increased inflammation in older adults
酮饮食可以用来治疗偏头痛吗？生酮疗法等饮食干预措施有望降低头痛的频率和严重程度，为全世界的人们提供潜在的缓解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Can-the-keto-diet-be-used-to-treat-migraines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Can-the-keto-diet-be-used-to-treat-migraines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76f0524d-0be1-4ff7-8ce3-5d81b4672eb3 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 23:07:00 -0400 Can the keto diet be used to treat migraines?
DASH 饮食可降低尿酸水平研究人员评估了生酮饮食和 DASH 饮食对血清尿酸水平的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/DASH-diet-reduces-uric-acid-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/DASH-diet-reduces-uric-acid-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7659e4c6-905c-49e8-9be3-7a7f497fd53e Sun, 02 Jul 2023 22:57:00 -0400 DASH diet reduces uric acid levels
长时间工作和工作与生活平衡不佳威胁着新加坡年轻专业人士的健康年轻人的长时间工作阻碍了健康行为，影响了人口健康。了解这些障碍对于有针对性的健康促进工作至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Long-work-hours-and-poor-work-life-balance-threaten-health-of-Singapores-young-professionals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Long-work-hours-and-poor-work-life-balance-threaten-health-of-Singapores-young-professionals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7da689e2-a872-4790-8ae4-3835ef4347b1 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 22:47:00 -0400 Long work hours and poor work-life balance threaten health of Singapore's young professionals
研究发现夜间限速并不能有效减少电动滑板车伤害研究旨在调查夜间限速是否与电动滑板车相关伤害的发生率有关。结果表明，夜间限速与伤害发生率降低无关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Study-finds-nighttime-speed-limits-not- effective-in-reducing-e-scooter-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Study-finds-nighttime-speed-limits-not- effective-in-reducing-e-scooter-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8bdb5d8-57c0-4355-8142-98955a656823 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 22:37:00 -0400 Study finds nighttime speed limits not effective in reducing e-scooter injuries
COVID-19 的严重程度与抗凝血蛋白的自身抗体有关研究调查了 ADAMTS13 抗体在 COVID-19 患者中的出现情况及其与疾病严重程度和 ADAMTS13 活性较低的关系。研究结果表明，需要将 ADAMTS13 抗体纳入诊断和管理 SARS-CoV-2 感染中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/COVID-19-severity-linked-to-autoantibodies-against-blood-clotting- Protein.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/COVID-19-severity-linked-to-autoantibodies-against-blood-clotting- Protein.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f966df22-663f-4a71-8f9d-9c1b20e29246 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 21:41:00 -0400 COVID-19 severity linked to autoantibodies against blood clotting protein
低收入和中等收入国家抗生素使用不当会破坏婴儿肠道健康，加剧抗菌素耐药性抗生素的过度使用会导致耐药细菌的问题。发展中国家和幼儿尤其受到影响。综述研究了抗生素如何影响低收入和中等收入国家婴儿的肠道细菌和耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Inproperty-antibiotic-use-in-low-and-middle-venue-countries-disrupts-infant-gut-health-fuels-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Inproperty-antibiotic-use-in-low-and-middle-venue-countries-disrupts-infant-gut-health-fuels-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d6062df-2248-4c7b-942d-4a80910ca708 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 21:33:00 -0400 Inappropriate antibiotic use in low and middle-income countries disrupts infant gut health, fuels antimicrobial resistance
不每晚刷牙可能会增加心血管疾病的风险研究调查了刷牙时间对心血管疾病风险的影响。研究发现，与根本不刷牙相比，晚上刷牙可以降低心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Skipping-nightly-toothbrushing-could-heighten-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Skipping-nightly-toothbrushing-could-heighten-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99de1254-0d06-4b8c-9dce-9702d8bf835a Sun, 02 Jul 2023 21:23:00 -0400 Skipping nightly toothbrushing could heighten cardiovascular disease risk
太空如何影响宇航员的免疫系统？研究探讨了太空条件下微重力和辐射对免疫系统的影响。它强调需要了解这些对未来长期太空任务的影响，并强调进一步调查的知识差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/How-does-space-affect-the-immune-system-of-astronauts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/How-does-space-affect-the-immune-system-of-astronauts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a41f2e9-48ff-4201-bc75-595d16c7e3ff Sun, 02 Jul 2023 21:05:00 -0400 How does space affect the immune system of astronauts?
英国的新冠死亡人数大幅下降，但痴呆症和心脏病仍然令人担忧新的政府数据显示上个月的死亡人数高于平均水平。痴呆症是英格兰的最大杀手，心脏病是威尔士的最大杀手。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Covid-deaths-plummet-in-England-but-dementia-and-heart-disease-remain-a-concern.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230701/Covid-deaths-plummet-in-England-but-dementia-and-heart-disease-remain-a-concern.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7fbac37-5632-4b05-bd21-6d65924d1ba8 Sat, 01 Jul 2023 11:49:00 -0400 Covid deaths plummet in England, but dementia and heart disease remain a concern
